snippet.textDisplay:
This is the only song or even combination of noises on the planet that can relax me.

I'm certain at least 30 of the views for this video are from me dropping by so I can calm down after something stressful.
snippet.textOriginal:
This is the only song or even combination of noises on the planet that can relax me.

snippet.textDisplay: This was such a sweet game.  Awesome characters, fun battles, compelling story, fishing.  I also liked that it had little secret areas you could visit and for some reason I loved the scenery.  This set the bar high for RPGs even if people didn't realize it.  Also, I have this song on my iPod and nothing is sweeter than getting this relaxing tune from time to time.
snippet.textOriginal: This was such a sweet game.  Awesome characters, fun battles, compelling story, fishing.  I also liked that it had little secret areas you could visit and for some reason I loved the scenery.  This set the bar high for RPGs even if people didn't realize it.  Also, I have this song on my iPod and nothing is sweeter than getting this relaxing tune from time to time.

snippet.textDisplay: thats not entirely being racist...there isnt any native americans or spanish folks in it either. the thing is if they did add black people in the game people would complain that it is racism against them like they did in resident evil 5 and people complain its racism if there isnt, its double jeopardy. thats why most games/animes dont contain black people, they just dont want to deal with the drama but people are seriously getting the word racism way out of context.

snippet.textDisplay: I'd love to see a six, unfortunately, it would probaby be terrible, seeing as imo, 1 was good, 2 was better, 3 was fantastic, 4 was good but not quite hitting the par that 3 set, and 5 was a bad departure, not a terrible game, but how dare they stick in the names Ryu and Nina and call it a BoF game.

snippet.textDisplay:
The first RPG that made me want to get devoted to it, music is great, story is great and it's an awesome game! Can't even be described! 

And memorable moments like going into town to just listen to the wonderful tunes that plays in the game is the best... The music didn't get you dreaded to return to a town just because the story forced you too, 
Now that's motivation!
snippet.textOriginal:
